title: PM condoles over death of renowned actor Khalid Butt
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 12 (APP):Caretaker Prime Minister Anwaar-ul-Haq Kakar on Friday expressed condolence over the death of Khalid Butt, a renowned actor of Pakistan Television, theatre and film.
“Khalid Butt was a very talented actor of PTV and theatre as well as the film industry,” the prime minister said in a statement.
He prayed to Allah Almighty for peace of the departed soul and strength for the bereaved family to bear the loss.
